songs.album: JJ Based on a Vill Story One
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
By the late seventies, Felix was infusing his organization with a discipline that panthers could only envy
Of kids as young as ten, serving as whistleblowers
Rooftop lookouts ready to shoot
In the [?] corporations from village residence
65th and 69th housing projects became to [?]
Much like the [?] in New Jack City
songs.title: Intro (JJ Based on a Vill Story)
